name: HotfixCount
description: Counts available hotfixes from Hotfixes table

src.sql:
SELECT COUNT(PH.Id) AS HotfixCount
FROM dbo.PlantAnApp_Updates_Hotfixes AS PH
INNER JOIN Packages AS P ON P.FriendlyName = PH.DnnFriendlyName
WHERE (
   SELECT CASE WHEN convert(int, parsename(PH.Version, 3)) > convert(int, parsename(PH.InstalledVersion, 3)) THEN 'greater'  
               WHEN convert(int, parsename(PH.Version, 3)) < convert(int, parsename(PH.InstalledVersion, 3)) THEN 'smaller'  
               ELSE CASE   
               WHEN convert(int, parsename(PH.Version, 2)) > convert(int, parsename(PH.InstalledVersion, 2)) THEN 'greater'  
               WHEN convert(int, parsename(PH.Version, 2)) < convert(int, parsename(PH.InstalledVersion, 2)) THEN 'smaller'  
               ELSE CASE   
               WHEN convert(int, parsename(PH.Version, 1)) > convert(int, parsename(PH.InstalledVersion, 1)) THEN 'greater'  
               WHEN convert(int, parsename(PH.Version, 1)) < convert(int, parsename(PH.InstalledVersion, 1)) THEN 'smaller'  
               ELSE 'equal'  
               END END END
	) = 'greater'
